ch0119_40_gladion/0101_0701_01_10:
Heh. I see you made it without being late,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0119_40_gladion/0101_0701_02_10:
You haven’t forgotten anything, have you?
Better check now!
ch0119_40_gladion/7101_0701_01_10:
If you ever see my sister, Lillie, at school,
keep an eye on her, would you?
ch0119_40_gladion/7101_0701_02_10:
She’s not like me. She’s too nice, so I worry
about her.
ch0119_40_gladion/7102_0701_01_10:
I once saw someone at school wearing a
uniform with super-damaged hems.
ch0119_40_gladion/7102_0701_02_10:
Be careful you don’t damage your uniform
when playing with your Pokémon.
ch0119_40_gladion/7102_0701_03_10:
If you ever get a tear in your uniform,
bring it to me. I’ll fix it for you.
ch0119_40_gladion/7103_0701_01_10:
Some people say an additional program
made Porygon-Z evolve.
ch0119_40_gladion/7103_0701_02_10:
That’s some amazing programming skill,
to make a Pokémon evolve.
ch0119_40_gladion/7103_0701_03_10:
Might not be bad to take a few academy
classes on the latest technology, huh.
ch0119_40_gladion/7104_0701_01_10:
I don’t really care about my class ranking at
school.
ch0119_40_gladion/7104_0701_02_10:
You compete with others to better yourself,
and all that effort just turns into a number.
ch0119_40_gladion/7104_0701_03_10:
If you want to get stronger just to be better
than others, you’re doing it for the wrong
reason.
ch0119_40_gladion/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I’ve got a
favor to ask.
ch0119_40_gladion/7105_0701_02_10:
It doesn’t have to be all the time, but...
Would you eat lunch with me on the rooftop
once in a while?
ch0119_40_gladion/7105_0701_03_10:
I just wanna give it a try, y’know? For the
full academy experience.
ch0119_40_gladion/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are. Here, take this.
ch0119_40_gladion/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s nothing special. Just thought it might
help with your schoolwork.
ch0119_40_gladion/2501_0701_01_10:
I never thought I’d actually get a chance to
go to school.
ch0119_40_gladion/2501_0701_02_10:
It wasn’t even on my radar when I ran
away from home in Alola and started
working as Team Skull’s muscle.
ch0119_40_gladion/2501_0701_03_10:
Heh. You never really know what’ll happen
in life, huh?
ch0119_40_gladion/2501_0702_01_10:
I had my doubts at first, but a busy school
life isn’t as bad as I expected.
ch0119_40_gladion/2501_0702_02_10:
Even Hau looks like he’s having more fun
than usual.
ch0119_40_gladion/2501_0702_03_10:
Guess I should take advantage of the
opportunity and just enjoy it.
ch0119_40_gladion/2511_0701_01_10:
How’re your academy classes going?
Keeping up OK?
ch0119_40_gladion/2511_0701_02_10:
If you’re having trouble, maybe I could tutor
you some.
ch0119_40_gladion/2511_0701_03_10:
Heh. I suppose I don’t have to worry about
that with you.
ch0119_40_gladion/2511_0702_01_10:
You really have to steel yourself when taking
a class on something you’re not good at.
ch0119_40_gladion/2511_0702_02_10:
Must be similar to how Pokémon feel when
battling at a disadvantage.
ch0119_40_gladion/3001_0701_01_10: Time to get going. Don’t make me wait.
ch0119_40_gladion/3003_0701_01_10:
What are you doing here? Aren’t you going
to go exploring?
ch0119_40_gladion/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s already dark—you should go rest.
Overdoing it is bad for both you and your
Pokémon.
